title: Leviticus 18-22 : Thou shalt not lie with mankind as with womankind: it is abomination.

body:
Wrong:

> And with a male you shall not lie beds of a woman, it is an abomination

As you can see it's gibberish. It was probably miscopied or a colloquial phrase that was forgotten long ago.

body: The KJV is incorrect and changes beds/lyings to "as with". Nearly every modern translation bases its renderings on the KJV so that's why this appears in almost all of them even though it's not in the original text. The third commandment is also corrupted for example, as "in vain" is more accurately "for falsehood" but nearly all versions retain "in vain" for the sake of KJV tradition.
body_html: The KJV is incorrect and changes beds/lyings to "as with". Nearly every modern translation bases its renderings on the KJV so that's why this appears in almost all of them even though it's not in the original text. The third commandment is also corrupted for example, as "in vain" is more accurately "for falsehood" but nearly all versions retain "in vain" for the sake of KJV tradition.
